author: boma_naps
content:
I’m currently working on a tool to highlight transactions that were part of the FOCIL in Ethereum blocks, using the engine_getInclusionList endpoint from the Engine API. The goal is to compare the inclusion list with actual block contents and visualize the transactions that were mandatorily included by the proposer.

As part of this, I’m reaching out to check whether there has been any implementation of the engine_getInclusionList endpoint on any client. Specifically:

    Has a PR been opened or merged for this endpoint?

    If yes, could you share the PR link or branch name?

    Are there any available testnet/devnet RPC URLs where this implementation can be tested?
